name: Peace On Earth Holiday Banner
description:
Ready to hang your first holiday decoration?? If so, this banner will be just perfect, or so we hope!

The Peace on Earth" banner is natural, beautiful and simple, perfect to hang all season long! The Brown and Green color scheme is soft, neutral and perfect for any home, studio, office, classroom, show booths... and anywhere else you can think of!

Each letter is 3.25" x 4.5" and is strung along on a cream or white cording. The banner is roughly 45-50" in length depending on the space you leave between each letters. Each banner will have 12"-16" of extra cording at each end for you to hang with ease.

Banners come in a box/cellophane bag to help keep your banner preserved to use for many years to come.

Printed on an 80lb, 100% recycled kraft paper and then duplexed atop a red cover paper adding a burst of color from the back and a nice sturdy paper!

These banners will fade and are not water resistant, therefore we recommend using them indoors or outside in a shaded, dry area.

Thank you for stopping in!

name: Ho Ho Ho Holiday Party Banner
description:
HO! HO! HO! says the main man this Christmas Season!

This banner is perfect to hang above your fireplace, by the tree, near the front door or draped across a bay window for all to see!

This cheery red and green design creates a classic style with images of two jolly Santas that are sure to bring a smile to all faces from 1 to 92... :)

This is a large letter banner, with each letter measuring in at 4.5" x 6" giving the total banner a length of 45"-50" depending on the amount of space given between each letter. Each banner has about 12"-16" of extra cording on each side to hang your new banner with ease.

Banner uses a white cording and is printed on a 100lb white felt textured paper.

Fun, cute and perfect! What could be better this holiday season!

Banners come in a box to help keep your banner preserved to use for many years to come.

These banners will fade and are not water resistant, therefore we recommend using them indoors or outside in a shaded, dry area.

Thank you for stopping in!

name: Deco Sun Birthday Banner
description:
Remember back in the day when you would decorate the house for Birthday parties? Remember those plain and fugly birthday banners?

As a girl who gets way too into birthdays I could no longer take my dollar store signage.

I finally broke down and created a new series of paper products for the perfect party!

The DECO SUN Sign is about 48" long with 12" of extra ribbon on each end to tie securely in place. Each Letter is 3" Wide x 4.5" Tall.

Printed on 100lb white, felt, recycled paper
Each letter has two holes with a white ribbon that goes through holding all the cards together and in place.

This item is not water proof and will eventually fade if stored in direct sunlight.

Hand made with Love!

Want to customize this banner, add a name, add an age, change the wording? Ask us today for pricing and information

name: 'Tis the Season to be Awesome Pack (4)
description:
If you are looking for a holiday card that breaks the mold then look no further because this card is AWESOME!

A fun and unique, folded 7x5 card print a deep purple-ish print and simple typography make this card absolutely perfect!

Printed on a textured natural white paper.

"Tis the season to be awesome"
7 x 5
four cards, four envelopes

Thanks for stopping in!

name: Three Berries Holiday Card Pack (6)
description:
Soft and natural, three berries is a delightful holiday card...

4.25 x 5.5 the card is printed on 100% recycled smooth, natural/tan paper paired with a recycled kraft color envelope (not actual kraft paper material).

This listing is for a pack of 6 cards and 6 envelopes packaged in a cello sleeve or box.

4.25 x 5.5
6 cards and 6 envelopes

Happy Holidays and thank you for stopping by our shop!
